short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add the reading time to Chrome Extension Documentation articles

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension shows users a webpage's reading time in minutes to help them plan how they read the article accordingly. Users should install this extension to easily approximate a webpage or articles reading time.
